meanings.definition: A person who organizes or arranges things systematically.
meanings.sent1: The systematizers at the library carefully categorize all the books.
meanings.sent2: The team of systematizers efficiently sorted the files by date.
meanings.sent3: The systematizers at the grocery store made sure all the products were neatly displayed.
meanings.sent4: She was a true systematizer, turning chaos into order effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The systematizers in the office were known for their precision and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: A group or organization that creates or follows a system.
meanings.sent1: The systematizers in the company developed a new workflow process.
meanings.sent2: The systematizers of the event planned every detail meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The systematizers of the school's schedule made sure every minute was accounted for.
meanings.sent4: The systematizers of the project ensured that every step was followed correctly.
meanings.sent5: The systematizers of the team were praised for their efficiency and organization.
